scripts.clean: shx rm -rf node_modules/.cache/turbo && turbo run clean
scripts.git:macos:remove-non-remote-branch: git fetch -p && git branch -vv | awk '/: gone]/{print $1}' | xargs git branch -D
scripts.newbie: yarn run newbie:localdev && yarn run newbie:cicd && yarn run newbie:nm-space && yarn run newbie:python
scripts.newbie:nm-space: ts-node scripts/nm-space/mirrorCopyOnly && ts-node scripts/nm-space/run run 'yarn install --no-immutable'
scripts.publish:github:dev: cross-env DOGU_RUN_TYPE=development yarn workspaces foreach -tvi --jobs unlimited run publish:github
scripts.publish:github:prod: cross-env DOGU_RUN_TYPE=production yarn workspaces foreach -tvi --jobs unlimited run publish:github
scripts.publish:npm:dev: cross-env DOGU_RUN_TYPE=development yarn workspaces foreach -tvi --jobs unlimited run publish:npm
scripts.publish:npm:prod: cross-env DOGU_RUN_TYPE=production yarn workspaces foreach -tvi --jobs unlimited run publish:npm
scripts.rebuild: yarn run clean && yarn run build --force
scripts.rebuild:archive: turbo run clean:archive --force && turbo run build:archive --force
scripts.rebuild:packages: yarn run clean:packages && yarn run build:packages --force
scripts.reset: yarn run clean-lock && yarn install && yarn run rebuild
scripts.start:console: yarn workspace console-web-server run start & yarn workspace console-web-front run start
scripts.start:console:inspect: yarn workspace console-web-server run start:inspect & yarn workspace console-web-front run start
scripts.third-party:download:build: yarn run third-party:download && turbo run build:archive
